channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Clare Balding presents continued coverage of the second round at Wimbledon, the third tennis grand slam tournament of the year. World number ones Jannik Sinner and Aryna Sabalenka have already reached the finals of the Australian and French Opens in 2025, but a third grand slam decider in the same year would be breaking new ground for both, as neither of them has previously reached the Wimbledon final. Before that, however, they must navigate their way through the early rounds.
